name: JunkySpaceFlight
description:
What happens when you go out in space while your ship is a piece of junk?

Well you can only guess, guns overloading, engines stopping and power cutting off  and along with that you have to defend yourself from asteriods that are swarming all around you.

Jump out of the seat and fix your ship! Start the engines! Fix the switches! And cool the battery! Press R to enter Crew mode and fix the problems on your ship with E. 

While flying W & S to move and mouse to aim and shoot.

Try to survive as long as you can.
